settings.custom_html:
<style>
    /*Calculator Start */
.container-gj-calc {
  margin: 0 auto;
  max-width: 1000px;
  display: flex;
  gap: 2%;
  background-color: #fff;
  justify-content: space-around;
  border: solid 2px #2183a3;
  position: relative;
}

.nav-gj-calc {
    display: flex;
    position: absolute;
    width: 100%;
}

.nav-button-gj-calc {
    padding: 5px 15px;
    border: 1px solid #2183a3;
    border-top: unset;
    color: #2183a3;
    cursor: pointer;
}

.nav-button-gj-calc-active {
    background-color: #2183a3;
    color: #E3EFF5;
}

.container-gj-calc p, .result-gj-calc > div:nth-child(11) .description-gj-calc {
  color: #2183a3;
  text-align:center;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  font-weight:bold;
  padding-top:20px;
}
.result-gj-calc > div:nth-child(13) > div.value-gj-calc, .result-gj-calc > div:nth-child(11) .value-gj-calc {
  font-family: var(--heading-font-family);
  font-weight: bold;
  font-size: 20px;
  text-transform:uppercase;
}
.result-gj-calc > div:nth-child(11) {
  flex-direction: column;
  text-align: center;
}

.container-gj-calc hr {
  margin: 0 0 1px 0;
}
.container-gj-calc input {
  accent-color: #2183a3;
}
.container-gj-calc select {
  color: #f2f7f5;
  font-size: 1rem;
  background-color: #2183a3;
}

.user-input-gj-calc {

  margin-bottom: 2rem;
  width:50%;
  padding:20px;
padding-top:50px;
}
.user-input-gj-calc div {
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.user-input-checkbox {
  display: none;
}

.checkbox-option-gj-calc {
  width: 50%;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 2%;
  flex-direction: column;
  padding: 5px 13px;
  border-radius: 10px;
  margin: 0px 3px;
}
.checkbox-option-gj-calc label {
  cursor: pointer;
  font-family:var(--font-family);
  text-transform: none;
}

.checkbox-gj-calc img {
  min-width: 2.5rem;
  max-width: 2.5rem;
}

.checkbox-choosen {
  color: #2183a3;
}

.shower-container {
  display: flex;
  gap: 2%;
  align-items: center;
}
.shower-container input{
  padding: 10px 15px;
  border-radius: 5px;
  border: 1px solid #2183a3;
  text-align: center;
}

.shower-modifier {
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  color: #2183a3;
  font-weight: bold;
  cursor: pointer;
  padding: 0px 10px;
}

.user-input-description label {
  font-weight: bold;
  font-family:var(--font-family)
}
#select-selected-id .select-selected-gj-calc:last-child {
  border-radius: 0 0 5px 5px;
}
.info-panel-gj-calc {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
}

.calculation-explanation {
  position: absolute;
  background-color: #E3EFF5;
  border: 2px solid #2183a3;
  visibility: hidden;
  z-index:1;
  padding: 10px 10px 0px 10px;
}
.calculation-explanation span, .calculation-explanation .info-panel-gj-calc {
  margin: 0 10px;
  justify-content: flex-start;
}
.calculation-explanation .info-panel-gj-calc div {
  margin-bottom:0;
}
#expl_fuel {
  font-weight:600;
}
#calculation_headline label {
  font-weight: bold;
  text-decoration: underline;
}

.custom-select-gj-calc {
  position: relative;
  border: 1px solid lightgrey;
  border-radius: 5px;
  border-left: 4px solid #2183a3;
  padding: 7px 0;
  margin-bottom: 0 !important;
  cursor: pointer;
}
.custom-select-gj-calc select {
  display: none;
}

.select-selected-gj-calc {
  border: 1px solid #2183a3;
  padding: 7px 0;
  margin-bottom: 0 !important;
  cursor: pointer;
  background-color: #fff;
}

.select-selected-gj-calc:hover {
  background-color: #E3EFF5;
}

.select-text-gj-calc {
  margin-left: 10px;
}

#select-option-gj-calc {
  margin-left: 10px;
}

#select-selected-id {
  position: absolute;
  min-width: 185px;
  max-width: 185px;
  z-index: 1;
}

.range-wrap {
  position: relative;
  margin: 0 auto 3rem;
}

.range {
  width: 100%;
}

.bubble {
  background: #2183a3;
  color: white;
  padding: 4px 12px;
  position: absolute;
  border-radius: 4px;
  left: 50%;
  transform: translateX(-50%);
  margin-top: 20px;
  min-width: 40px;
  text-align: center;
}

.bubble::after {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  width: 2px;
  height: 2px;
  background: #2183a3;
  top: -1px;
  left: 50%;
}
.result-gj-calc {
  width: 50%;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding:20px;
  background:#E3EFF5;
}
.gj-anschluesse {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
}
.checkbox-option-gj-calc.checkbox-choosen {
  background:#2183a3;
}
.checkbox-option-gj-calc.checkbox-choosen .checkbox-choosen {
  color:#fff;
  padding:0;
}
#checkbox_wrapper_connection1 > div:nth-child(1), #checkbox_wrapper_connection1 > div:nth-child(2), #checkbox_wrapper_connection2 > div:nth-child(1), #checkbox_wrapper_connection2 > div:nth-child(2) {
  margin-bottom:0;
}
#calculation_headline-mob .rich_text_button, #calculation_headline .rich_text_button {
  color:inherit;
  text-transform:none;
  cursor:pointer;
}


@media screen and (max-width: 1110px) {
  .container-gj-calc {
    flex-direction: column;
  }
  .checkbox-gj-calc {
    text-align: left;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    width: 70%;
    margin: 0 auto;
    justify-content: space-around;
  }
  .result-gj-calc {
    width: 100%;
    margin: 0 auto;
  }
  .range-wrap {
    width: 100%;
  }
  .user-input-description {
    max-width: 100%;
    margin-right: 5px;
  }
  .user-input-gj-calc {
    width:100%;
    padding:10px;
padding-top:50px;
  }
  .gj-calc-mobile-wrapper {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-between;
  }
  .gj-calc-mobile-wrapper .gj-anschluesse {
    flex-direction: row;
  }
  .gj-calc-mobile-wrapper .gj-anschluesse .checkbox-option-gj-calc {
    margin: 0px 3px;
  }
  .gj-calc-mobile-wrapper .custom-select-gj-calc {
    min-width:50%;
  }
  #select-selected-id {
    right:20px;
  }
}
.gj-anschluesse  input.user-input-checkbox-mob {
    display: none;
}
#select-option-gj-calc-mob {
  padding-left:10px;
}

#container-gj-calc-mob {display:none;}
@media screen and (max-width: 1110px) {
#container-gj-calc-mob {display:block;}
#container-gj-calc{display:none;}
}
.user-input-checkbox {
    display: none!important;
}
.shower-container input {min-width:100px;}
.anschaffungskosten, #user-input-description-fitness {display:none;}
/* Calculator End */</style>
